official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on chemical intermediate.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on (6R,7R)-7-amino-3-chloro-8-oxa-5-thia-1 -azabicyclo(4.20)oct-2-ene-2-carboxylic acid, (4-nitrophenyl)-methyl ester.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on chemical intermediate.
